import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { } from '../../Redux/action' import uuidv4 from 'uuid' import Navbar from '../Common/Navbar' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' class ViewTicket extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { const { allUserTicket, match, companyData } = this.props const data = allUserTicket.find(item => item.id === Number(match.params.id)) // const company = companyData.find(item => item.id === Number(data.company_id)) console.log(data) return ( <>
Ticket Information
{data.title}

Company Name : {data.company}

Status : {data.status} Category : {data.category}
Bootstrap 11 mins ago
Hello, world! This is a toast message.
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ allUserTicket: state.allUserTicket, companyData: state.companyData }); const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(ViewTicket);
